'Principal' (Portuguese, meaning ; Capeverdean Crioulo: Prinsipal), is a village
located in the north central part of the island of Santiago, Cape Verde, it is
located north-northwest of the island capital of Praia and southeast of
Tarrafal. The village is linked by the Tarrafal-Assomada Road as well as the Tarrafal-
Praia Road. The Serra da Malagueta lies to the south.
categories: Villages and settlements in Santiago, Cape Verde
